title: Bug fix request
text:
Reduced to 2 stars because no response has been given to this bug below.  Please fix!

When using the app on an ipad and trying to book through â€œsavedâ€ list properties and when changing the booking dates, the calendar is not properly sized and days of the week are missing (I think Sundays and Saturdays). So this function is basically useless and I have to use my iphone app. Can you please address this bug? Thank you!

title: Easy peesy!
text: Love Booking.com booked, then needed to extend stay. Booking.com made it easy to accomplish reservations

title: The money has not been refunded
text: Arrived at the hotel, paid via the app in advance. The application showed "paid". The hotel said "declined". I called the support three times, the support said that the money would be refunded within 24 hours. The money has not been refunded . I will not use the app anymore

title: Very easy to use
text: I love booking.com app. Very easy to use and clean interface. I have become â€œaddictedâ€ to it. You will fall in love once you start using it.

title: Cozy hotel with kind staff
text: We are currently staying at the hotel, and we are thoroughly impressed. The rooms are tastefully decorated, creating a cozy and warm atmosphere throughout the entire hotel. The breakfast offers a diverse selection, and the staff is friendly and eager to assist with anything. Upon our arrival, they provided detailed explanations about the hotel facilities and handed us a map with highlighted places to visit. The rooftop terrace boasts a phenomenal view of the city. We highly recommend this hotel for its welcoming ambiance and excellent services.

title: New Favorite Spot
text:
Puerto Rico has always been my home always from home but we normally stay with family. This location hosted my whole family after our wedding and we enjoyed it very much. 

Love all the walkable places near by. Beach, food, bars. We will be returning again and again.

title: Great deals
text: The best deals for travel

title: Beautiful place
text: We loved this apartment. Stayed there 2 nights. The apartment was clean, plenty of room for us to stay comfortable. The apartment is located close to a lot of shops and attractions. The owner was very friendly and recommended few good places to visit and eat. Definitely recommend the place and we give 5 stars to everything.

title: No ability to contact customer service
text: I have tried to contact booking.com customer service through email and phone, and I cannot get any response. I have tried several times, spent too much time, I gave up. The email responses are from someone with no ability or will to help or get me in contact with someone who can help. The phone is automated call with no ability to talk to a person. There is really no way to get in touch with booking.com if you have an issue.

title: Wonderful stay and wonderful staff!
text: We couldnâ€™t have asked for a better experience and stay. Customer service was top notch and the apartment was clean, updated and had 2 lovely terraces. The grocery items were replenished daily and we cooked breakfast every morning. They changed the beds and towels daily and did the dishes too! Itâ€™s centrally located, 10 minute walk from the train and right near the water. I would definitely stay again!

title: Unable to get support
text: Had an unrecognized charge from booking.com but could not reach support because they require a booking number but if the issue is that thereâ€™s no booking then Iâ€™m stuck in an infinite look. I emailed support multiple times, only for them to email me back to call them but when calling them, I canâ€™t get to a person without a booking number.

title: Impossible to contact customer service
text:
Even though I have my currency set to US dollars, Booking.com keeps showing prices in foreign currency. There is no way for me to contact customer service through the app.
This app is highly disappointing

title: Great App , EASY TO WORK WITH 5 STARS
text: App locates hotels, can give you distance from destination, give prices ratings and reviews. Works Great

title: Beautiful villa in a fabulous location
text: The villa was absolutely adorable. The beds and pillows were very comfortable and smelled so nice!  We loved the decorating and the cool vibe of the villa.  Carlos gave us recommendations for grocery stores, and restaurants which we appreciated and used. He was very attentive and answered our questions promptly.  We will definitely come back and bring friends.  The location is outstanding.

title: Great Place to stay
text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Ramada in Oakland, California, near downtown, and let me tell you, it was a great experience! The pricing was just right, which is always a plus. The front desk gentleman and the entire staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel right at home. 

As a California native, I appreciated the relaxed and casual vibe throughout my stay. Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better place to unwind and explore the city. The room is a little dated in terms of design, but considering the price, it exceeds expectations in terms of amenities. 

The only other random random observation, there was no fridge or a microwave. It definitely wasn't a big deal sincee I only realized it halfway through my trip and didn't really need them. It didn't make much of a difference to me, but I did notice their absence. 

Overall, this trip has been one of the best I've had in a long time. Iâ€™m not sure if Iâ€™m supposed to leave a 10 out of 10, a five star, or swipe right but.....you had me at, "I need your credit card and your ID."

title: Terrible customer service
text: I used to swear by Booking, but over the past few years their customer service has gotten terrible! Iâ€™ve been left on hold for over 10-mins and then disconnected; been told to wait upwards of 3.5-hours past my scheduled check in time for them to connect with property hosts; and have continually been told to follow up with them because they will not follow up on issues with you. Needless to say, all the properties on Booking are available on other rental websites. Iâ€™ve decided to take my business elsewhere

title: Honorable and trustworthy site!
text:
Booking.com is a travel site you can trust. As a frequent worldwide traveler, this is paramount to me!There are no hidden fees, total pricing is all inclusive. No gimmicks or schemes. They purely offer great service at a fair price.  Comforting!  Cheers to Booking.com!

Kindly,

Tamara~

title: Too many unwanted messages
text: Booking.com does that annoying thing where theyâ€™ll send you daily messages about specials in the EAU or other places around the world where you have no plans to visit. I want to turn off notifications but I need them on for important messages about my real bookings. Its easy to find in the preferences how to change email preferences but impossible to figure out how to stop unwanted marketing messages.
